data_source: Weekly stress surveys, anxiety frequency reports

recommendation.immediate_action: Increase counseling staff availability during peak stress periods (midterms, finals)
recommendation.resource_allocation: Add 3 additional counselors, extend hours to include weekends
recommendation.program_development: Implement mandatory stress management workshops for high-risk demographics

success_metrics: Reduce average stress levels from 8.2 to 6.0

data_source: Sleep quality ratings, exercise frequency tracking

recommendation.resource_allocation: Partner with Recreation Center for free fitness programs
recommendation.program_development: Create 24/7 quiet study spaces, install sleep pods in library

success_metrics: Improve average sleep quality from 2.3 to 3.5
Reduce health center visits for fatigue-related issues

data_source: Social connection surveys, loneliness frequency reports

recommendation.immediate_action: Expand peer mentorship programs and social events
recommendation.program_development: Create structured study groups, increase campus social events by 200%

data_source: Study-life balance ratings, academic stress sources

recommendation.immediate_action: Redesign study spaces for better collaboration and quiet zones
recommendation.resource_allocation: Upgrade library infrastructure, add group study rooms
recommendation.program_development: Time management workshops, academic coaching programs

success_metrics: Improve study-life balance ratings from 4.2 to 6.0

data_source: Financial stress frequency, service usage patterns

recommendation.immediate_action: Increase financial literacy programming and emergency aid availability
recommendation.resource_allocation: Expand financial aid office hours, hire financial counselor
recommendation.program_development: Emergency grant program, part-time job placement assistance

success_metrics: Reduce 'always stressed' financial responses from 20% to 8%
Increase financial aid office satisfaction by 45%

data_source: Healthcare access difficulty ratings, service usage patterns

recommendation.immediate_action: Extend health center hours, implement telehealth options
recommendation.resource_allocation: Add evening clinic hours, telehealth platform subscription
recommendation.program_development: Mobile health services, online appointment system

success_metrics: Improve healthcare access rating from 3.2 to 4.2

recommendation.immediate_action: Enhance alcohol education and alternative social programming
recommendation.resource_allocation: Expand health education staff, increase substance-free events
recommendation.program_development: Peer education programs, alternative weekend activities

recommendation.resource_allocation: Partner with IT for screen time tracking tools
recommendation.program_development: Digital detox programs, mindful technology use workshops

success_metrics: Reduce average recreational screen time from 7.2 to 5.0 hours
Increase awareness of digital wellness by 80%
Launch 3 digital detox events per semester

trend_identified: Low Awareness of Available Campus Services

recommendation.immediate_action: Redesign campus service marketing and outreach strategy
recommendation.resource_allocation: Hire marketing coordinator, develop mobile app for services
recommendation.program_development: Campus service fair, peer ambassador program

success_metrics: Double service utilization across all departments

trend_identified: Mixed Safety Perceptions, Room for Improvement
data_source: Campus safety perception surveys, security incident reports

recommendation.resource_allocation: Install additional emergency call boxes, hire 2 security officers
